en: And I regarded them not, saith the Lord.

ngiemboon: pɔ́ gwɔ́ pʉ̀a pɔ́ɔn
en: And they shall be to me a people:

ngiemboon: Á léfóo ná mûɔ mémúɔ gẅie aa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b, ńgʉa ńkúu ná nzẅìŋe ndÿò.
en: From the least to the greatest.

ngiemboon: N te gÿo gíŋe kímte menò tepòŋ mɔ́b wɔ́.
en: And their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.

ngiemboon: Lúm we tsoló gẅie aa nzèm mmó nzsǒ yɛ̌ gwɔ́ kwà’ jʉ’e Ssé.
en: And after the second veil, the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all;

ngiemboon: Ńgwɔ́ mé le zɔɔn ńtóŋo ŋwà’ne gie nyìŋ ka lɔg ńtÿɔ́g legwé sé té gwɔ́ gie ngàŋ kwě tà mé gyá wɔ́.
en: For where a testamentis, there must also of necessity be the death of the testator.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á la gÿo mé té nuŋe mbɔɔ ndùŋ mvfò*kʉ̀a té pfɛte metse wɔ́.
en: Whereupon neither the firsttestamentwas dedicated without blood.

ngiemboon: Mɔɔn ée metse*kʉ̀a gie e Ssé gɔ̌ɔn ngie tà pi lá’ ńdɔg ḿma’a kwàŋ,
en: saying, Thisisthe blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you.

ngiemboon: ńgíŋe ńzɛ metse ná ntàb mbɔɔ ná shúm ntsèm sie pànuŋe pwɔ́’ lɔgɔ fa’a.
en: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle, and all the vessels of the ministry.

ngiemboon: Mé lɔɔn ńcwoŋo ńdíe mboŋó, mbà yɛ̌ ntí lenùŋe pwɔ́’ aa legwɔ̌ ngù’ ntsèm ńkímte mbwo pʉ̀a mesoŋ ngie pɔ́ ée pʉ̀a tepòŋ.
en: But in thosesacrifices there isa remembrance againmadeof sins every year.

ngiemboon: Tá ńké ńná mbùm nnɛ́ né mèŋ
en: But a body hast thou prepared me:

ngiemboon: ńké tè kwoŋ pwɔ́’ gẅie mé nuŋe mvfò gù ńtí nò tepòŋ wɔ́.
en: In burnt offerings andsacrificesfor sin thou hast had no pleasure.

ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mmó gie mé la ŋwe’e tsɛ̀ɛ lepu’ú ŋwà’ne jú ńtí wɔ̀ɔn.
en: To do thy will, O God.

ngiemboon: Kristo gɔɔn pá’ɔɔn, ńdɔg ḿbyága ndùŋ mvfò ntí lenuŋe pwɔ́’, ńdɔg ye sẅé ńkúbe.
en: then said he, Lo, I come to do thy will, O God. He taketh away the first, that he may establish the second.

ngiemboon: Kristo la gÿo mmó gie e Ssé ne ńkwoŋo. À la náa twó mbùm yé tà’ legʉ̀a á ku’. Á lɔg pú’u, ńgÿo peg ku’ pʉ̀a Ssé.
en: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ oncefor all.

ngiemboon: Áa jʉ’ó tà ńkú fʉ̀’ɔɔn, ńne ńzẅí’te ngie Ssé lɔg megàŋ mbù pé ńgÿo ntÿɔgɔ́ mekwò mé.
en: from henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie a Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gíŋe ńne shwóŋó wégè ngie áa nò. Á vɔg ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: Whereofthe Holy Ghost also is a witness to us: for after that he had said before,

ngiemboon: Mbɔɔ nkwaŋá wɔ́b tyé pɔ́ nà mbʉ̌ mɔ́ɔn
en: And in their minds will I write them;

ngiemboon: «Á gʉa nà menò tepòŋ mɔ́b mbɔɔ nà menò mɔ́b mie é té tyé, n de lá’ ńgíŋ ńkímte wɔ́».
en: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔgɔ pú’u, ńgẅiin*nùŋe pwɔ́’ we lÿò gẅie aa kwà’ wɛ̌, yé zɔ̌ líe pʉ̀a Ssé.
en: andhavingan high priest over the house of God;

ngiemboon: Ammó gie ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ ńnéŋe ḿbɔ́g tɛ’, aa légwe ntsaŋ á mvfò Ssé gẅie aa ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ wó!
en: It isa fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, tà pi kʉ́a lézáb ntʉ́m nà Ssé, á nue máamáa ntsɔ’ɔ́ fà’ aa mǒ.
en: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward.

ngiemboon: À tè láte wɔ́.
en: And he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.

ngiemboon: anò yé le gíŋe ḿboŋo wɔ̀ɔn mɔ́.
en: But ifany mandraw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him.

ngiemboon: E Ssé la gɔɔn nà tsɔ́ pʉ̀a pé pe fʉ̀’e mvfò ngie, ée kwà’ pʉ̀a, á fó pɔ́ nà yɔb ntí lezǎb ntʉ́m ná yé.
en: For by it the elders obtained a good report.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ la gɔɔn pú’u, ńdɔgɔ ńkwa’a ńnyɛɛ ngie pɔ́ nyé tá ńgwá fa’a jʉ’ gie kwà’ lá’a yɔ́b áa wó.
en: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country.

ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ pá’ e Ssé la gɔɔn nò mbwo Ábalam ngie: «Ɔ̀ ge lá’ cʉa pɔ́ ná Esâg tá gẅiin ngẅɛ̀ gie n da ka’a mbwo gù».
en: of whom it was said, That in Isaac shall thy seed be called:

ngiemboon: Á la fó pɔ́ ná pá’ Mǒsê la záb ntʉ́m wé nà Ssé, tá á gwɔ́ tà ńgwɔ́ ndÿò, ńdʉ’ mekù’ nyìŋ gẅie má we aa míŋ fùɔ Faraon.
en: By faith Moses, when he was come to years, refused to be called the son of Pharaoh's daughter;

ngiemboon: Pi zɔ́ɔn fó ńnyé pɔ́ tè lɔg pá’ pi ne ńdʉ’ʉ nò tepòŋ, ḿbyɛ́b ncù tà mé pfɛte metse mí.
en: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood, striving against sin.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ńcÿɔ́gɔ gú ɔ̀ pɔ́ɔn létsyɛte nnɛ́
en: Nor faint when thou art rebuked of him:

ngiemboon: Á lɔgɔ tsemé mmó ńcúa wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gwie yé Ssé zsě ngie aa míŋ we.
en: And scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.

ngiemboon: E Ssé lɔɔn tè kaga gẅi pá’ à kaga penkʉ́ pé wɔ́, mbà pi lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ púɔ gÿɛ́, pi tè kwà’ púɔ pé wɔ́.
en: But if ye be without chastisement, whereof all are partakers, then are ye bastards, and not sons.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pi siŋ mbwó mí mie é kʉ̌a, ésiŋ mekẅi’té mí mie é ne ńzóŋe.
en: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down, and the feeble knees;

ngiemboon: Àammó gie mé la ne ńgyá, á vege pʉ̀a vege, tà Mǒsê gɔɔn ngie à pǔ ńcÿɔ’ cÿɔ’ tà ńcʉ́’ʉ ḿvɛɛ vɛ.
en: and so terrible was the sight,thatMoses said, I exceedingly fear and quake:)

ngiemboon: Á nue e Ssé yege, ée mmɔ̌g gẅie é tuɔ shúm ntsèm sie ée mbwo yé ńgwɔ́ se tepòŋ.
en: for our Godisa consuming fire.

ngiemboon: Pi kẅi’i ńgẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, pá’ á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pʉ̀a Kristo gÿo pú’u, tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b.
en: Let brotherly love continue.

ngiemboon: Tà pi lege lékúe megʉ̀ pie é tǒ mbʉ̀a pi, etsɔ́ pʉ̀a la lá’ ńkúe megʉ̀ kǔe, tà ńdá’a lyɛ̌’ ńkúe*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé té zsé.
en: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers: for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ mesoŋ ku’u légÿo kɔ́ ná mèŋ?
en: What man shall do unto me.

ngiemboon: Yěsô Kristo à laa kúbe, à kaa kúbe, à tě ńdá’a lyɛ̌’ ńkúbe wɔ́.
en: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pege fó yégè á jʉ’ gie mé tsẅé wó, ńkẅɛ, ńgʉa ńtsɛ́ɛ yé, ńne ńzẅíŋe ngie mé zoonte wégè pá’ yé.
en: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.

ngiemboon: Tà pi lege légÿo nò mbòŋo mbɔɔ lélɔgɔ mmó gie pi gẅiin ńkẅéte pʉ̀a, á nue legÿo mɛ̌ menò áa lii pwɔ́’ gie á poŋ Ssé.
en: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.

ngiemboon: M bǔ ńcwoŋo ńdúɔ mbwo pi ngie pi nyɛte sẅíŋte Ssé, à zẅíŋ m biŋ nzèm ńtó ńtsɛ́ɛ gẅí.
en: But I beseechyouthe rather to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.

ngiemboon: Pi zsé ngie mé kě ńnyé pwó ná fɛ́ wege Timoté. À lɔɔn ńtɔ́g ńtó, mbà mèŋ n ge gwɔ tó gyá gẅi peg yé gwɔ́.
en: Know ye thatourbrother Timothy is set at liberty; with whom, if he come shortly, I will see you.

ngiemboon: Pi tsyɛ’te pàtsyeen gẅi té vʉ’ʉ tsɔ̌, ńtsyɛ’te mbɔɔ pʉ̀a Ssé métsèm. Epʉ̀a pe Italia é gɔ̌ɔn ngie mèŋ n tsyɛ’te gẅí.
en: Salute all them that have the rule over you, and all the saints. They of Italy salute you.

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńgwɔ́ né pi metsèm.
en: Written to the Hebrews from Italy by Timothy.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ mentí mentí lɔɔn ńne ńkúu gẅí, pi lɔg pɔ́ kwà’ lekág ńkẅé.
en: My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations;

ngiemboon: Tà ntí nyìŋ pú’u, kwaŋ ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge náa tsɔ́ lága mmó né yé,
en: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.

ngiemboon: mélà’ mie nyìŋ pú’u, tè gɔɔn tsɔ́ nò tà ńtÿɔ́gɔ kwò mǒ wɔ́. À kwaŋa lépʉ, ńgíŋ ńkwaŋa lécwóŋ pɔ́ fʉ̀’ó.
en: A double minded manisunstable in all his ways.

ngiemboon: Á poŋ ngie fɛ́ wege gẅie aa fÿɔg kág, á nue e Ssé ŋǎ’ nzẅìŋ wé.
en: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted:

ngiemboon: Ye ntí letsɔ̌ɔn shúm zɔ shwoŋte yé, á gwe ná lejÿɔ̀’.
en: but every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed.

ngiemboon: Letsɔ̌ɔn shúm ŋwɛ́ gwɔ́ tà ńgá’, ńkẅɛɛ nò tepòŋ, anò tepòŋ gá’ ńkẅɛɛ legwé.
en: Then when lust hath conceived, it bringeth forth sin: and sin, when it is finished, bringeth forth death.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn pe ntʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, tà nkwaŋá gẅi fʉte gẅí.
en: Do not err, my beloved brethren.

ngiemboon: mélà’mie nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgyáŋa lóŋ, mbà à tě ńdɔgɔ ńgÿo mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé wɔ́.
en: for the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God.

ngiemboon: À lǐe tà ńtsẅé jʉ’, tà fó jʉ’ó ńgʉa, ḿbú ńdege pá’ à gwɔ̌.
en: for he beholdeth himself, and goeth his way, and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńgÿo pú’u, pi lě ńdɔgɔ ńgẅiin tyɛ̀’te tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi wɔ́? Pi lě ńdɔgɔ pɔ́ nkwaŋá tepòŋ ńdíe pʉ̀a éfa’a pì wɔ́?
en: are ye not then partial in yourselves, and are become judges of evil thoughts?

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ zɔ̌ téen shwóŋó tepòŋ ná Yěsô Kristo gẅie Ssé la ná lezíŋ sé né pi wɔ́ le?
en: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called?

ngiemboon: Tá pi ké ńgẅiin tyɛ̀’te tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, mbà pi gÿǒ nò tepòŋ.*Lepʉ̌ Ssé gwoon gẅi mélà’ mie pi fʉ̌a*lepʉ̌.
en: but if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzɔɔn ńkú’te mbʉ̌ Ssé, ńgʉa mǒ fʉa pɔ́ ndà’ tà’, mbà à pǔ fʉa pɔ́ mbʉ̌ ntsèm.
en: For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in onepoint, he is guilty of all.

ngiemboon: Pi gwaa ne gɔɔn nò, ńne ńgÿo pá’ pʉ̀a pie mé ge lá’ lɔg*lepʉ̌ sie é gÿo mé cʉ́’ʉ pà ndù nnɛ́ e lɔg ŋaga wɔ́b.
en: So speak ye, and so do, as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ ne ńzẅíŋe ngie e Ssé, ee yémɔ’ɔ́, oon áa mbòŋ,*messé tepòŋ gíŋe ńne ńzẅíŋe yɔ́b pɔ́ pú’u, tá ḿbiŋe ńne ḿvɛɛ.
en: Thou believest that there is one God; thou doest well: the devils also believe, and tremble.

ngiemboon: Agʉ̀gʉ̀ yɔ́ɔn, ɔ̀ kwoŋo kɔ́? Mèŋ n ge nyɛɛ gú ngie lezǎb ntʉ́m nà Ssé gẅie à tè mefà’ gẅiin áa sẅɛ̀ɛ.
en: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?

ngiemboon: Pi giŋé ńne ńzsé pá’ múɔ mésesà’ mmɔ̌g lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ á tuɔ máamáa mbím.
en: Even so the tongue is a little member, and boasteth great things. Behold, how great a matter a little fire kindleth!

ngiemboon: Tá ńgʉa nà lʉ́m, mbà tsɔ̌ nyìŋ tè ku’u lékúe wɔ́. Á tág jʉ’ té zẅite. Á gẅiin sesiŋ gie á kúu ná nyìŋ ńzẅé yé zẅé.
en: but the tongue can no man tame;it isan unruly evil, full of deadly poison.

ngiemboon: Mbʉ́lè mbɔɔ ndòon pǔ ńkẅɛɛ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ tà’ ncwò wémɔ’ɔ́. Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, á kɔ’ɔ́ tè poŋ ngie à gwɔ́ pú’u wɔ́.
en: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing. My brethren, these things ought not so to be.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tsɔ́ lesa’á ntse le ne fóo nà jʉ’ ńnáa ntse nǔ, ńgíŋe fó pɔ́ jʉ’ó ńnáa ntse gẅie é ne ńdẅe wɔ́.
en: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweetwaterand bitter?

ngiemboon: Alʉŋte nnɛ́ mbɔɔ kègɔ́’ vɔg tà ńgwɔ́ jʉ’, atág mbɔɔ mefà’ tepòŋ mentí mentí gwɔ́ wó.
en: For where envying and strifeis, thereisconfusion and every evil work.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pi ne ńnuŋe ssé mvfò Ssé, ńne ńdʉ’ʉ Sátà, à fó lejʉ́ŋ pi ńkÿo.
en: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

ngiemboon: Pi sẅí’i mbùm gí ńnáa ssé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, à pʉ’ʉ gẅí.
en: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.

ngiemboon: Pi ke’e gɔɔn pɔ́ ngie, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ, mbà peg ge gwɔ́ ntentʉ́, é gÿo yɔɔn, é gÿo gi.
en: For that yeoughtto say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that.

ngiemboon: Tá pi tsẅiŋ pɔ́ kékʉ́b gẅi, ńgɔɔnte pɔ́ menò mie pi ge gÿo gÿo. Yɛ̌ ntí leŋá’te e tè poŋ.
en: But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is evil.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, nyìŋ gẅie à zsé légÿo nò gie áa mbòŋ, ḿbiŋ ńké tè gÿo, à lɔgɔ ńgÿo nò tepòŋ, ńdɔgɔ ńgwe ntsaŋ.
en: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doethitnot, to him it is sin.

ngiemboon: Pi zẅí’te ńjú’, pi megàŋa mmó, pi lʉa tà ngyè gi kwɔ́’ɔ tÿǒ ńtí ngɔ́’ gie e ne ńtóo ná pi.
en: Go to now,yerich men, weep and howl for your miseries that shall come uponyou.

ngiemboon: Shúm sí sie é cÿɔ́g nkáb lʉ̌, shÿɔ́’ ngwɔ̌’ jÿǒ menzsǒ mí.
en: Your riches are corrupted, and your garments are motheaten.

ngiemboon: Pi ka záb menò twó pà tèfʉa, ńzẅéte wɔ́b, pɔ́ ké tè tíɛ tsɔ́ tʉ̀ mvfò pi wɔ́.
en: Ye have condemnedandkilled the just;andhe doth not resist you.

ngiemboon: Mbɔɔ pi gí, pi lɔgɔ kwɔ́gɔ nnɛ́ ńzẅí’te, tà pi tsyɛte nnɛ́ á nue á cʉ́’ pɔ́ mejʉ’, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a tó.
en: Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts: for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅi lɔɔn ńne ńgyá ngɔ́’, á sẅíŋte Ssé, ńne ńkága á zɔb mezɔ́bɔ ntse ńdɔg ńgu’te Ssé.
en: Is any among you afflicted? let him pray. Is any merry? let him sing psalms.

ngiemboon: Á gíŋe sẅíŋte Ssé, mbʉ̀ŋ lú, àtsetsá’ ná shúm léjÿó.
en: And he prayed again, and the heaven gave rain, and the earth brought forth her fruit.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, nyìŋ gẅi lɔɔn fʉa mánzsè, ńnyé nò gie áa nénʉ́, mé piŋ ńtÿɔ́gte yé, tà á piŋ nzèm,
en: Brethren, if any of you do err from the truth, and one convert him;

ngiemboon: Pi kága nue, pi ne ńgee ńgẅiin mmó gie pi kɔ̌ɔn ńzába ntʉ́m nà Ssé ńtí yɛ̌, á gwɔ́ pá’ Ssé ge gÿo pi tsẅɛ́.
en: receiving the end of your faith,eventhe salvation ofyoursouls.

ngiemboon: Pi gwɔ́ pɔ́ Ndʉalʉ̌a nà kwò legìŋ gí ntsèm, ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Ssé gẅie à ka tóŋo gẅi aa Ndʉalʉ̌a la.
en: but as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;

ngiemboon: Á zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwà’ne, e Ssé gɔɔn ngie: «Pi gwɔ́ Ndʉalʉ̌a, á nue mèŋ n gee Ndʉalʉ̌a.»
en: because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.

ngiemboon: Legǐ jǔm, à tootǒ tsɔ́’ɔ ńgwe ssé.
en: The grass withereth, and the flower thereof falleth away:

ngiemboon: Yɛ̌ shwóŋè áa gie pi ka jú’u tsɛ̀ɛ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo gẅie mé ka tsẅii mbwo pi.
en: And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you.

ngiemboon: Ŋwà’ne Ssé zɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie: Pi kéen ńzẅí’ tà ńjú’ pá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a poŋ pú’u.
en: if so be ye have tasted that the Lordisgracious.

ngiemboon: ńgwɔ́ gẅie nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzáb ntʉ́m ná yé, eshʉ́ le lá’ ńkúu ngàŋ wɔ́.
en: And he that believeth on him shall not be confounded.

ngiemboon: léen ńcʉ́’ʉ tóon lezẅé ndá.
en: The same is made the head of the corner,

ngiemboon: !Pi cʉa nà lezíŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ńjú’ ncwò pàsá’a lá’ métsèm. Pi jú’ ncwò Kasa gẅie à tyé mvfó pàsá’a lá’ métsèm,
en: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord's sake: whether it be to the king, as supreme;

ngiemboon: Pi ná mekù’ mânyìŋ ntsèm, ńkwoŋ mefɛ́ pi pʉ̀a Kristo, ḿbɔ́g Ssé, ńná mekù’ fùɔ.
en: Honour allmen. Love the brotherhood. Fear God. Honour the king.

ngiemboon: Yé Kristo la tè tsɔ́ nò tepòŋ gÿo, ńké tè shwóŋ cÿɔ̌ nò wɔ́.
en: who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth:

ngiemboon: Mbà pɔ́ gyǎ kwò legìŋ gí gie*lɔ̌’ té mǒ wɔ́, á piŋ ńgẅiin mekù’.
en: while they behold your chaste conversationcoupledwith fear.

ngiemboon: ḿbɔ́ɔn ncwò we, ḿbɔ́g cÿɔ̌ nò.
en: And his lips that they speak no guile:

ngiemboon: é fa’ mbʉ́lè, ńzsete nzèm yé.
en: Let him seek peace, and ensue it.

ngiemboon: Tá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a kě ńtém pɔ́ nzèm pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ gÿo nò tepòŋ.
en: But the face of the Lordisagainst them that do evil.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńnéŋe twó ńgÿo pɔ́ nò mbòŋo, mbà wɔ́ ge gÿo nò tepòŋ ná pi?
en: And whoishe that will harm you, if ye be followers of that which is good?

ngiemboon: A Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ŋwɛ́ gÿo á gʉa lá’ mepfó é shwóŋó nò Ssé mbwo mezẅige pʉ̀a mesoŋ mie é laa ndá tsǎŋ.
en: by which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison;

ngiemboon: Tá’ pɔ́ ge gÿo tyé mvfò Ssé gẅie à tyě pá’ à ge zá’ ntsaŋ pʉ̀a metʉ̀ pâ mepfó ssé, építe ncwò wɔ́b nà ngÿǒ menò mɔ́b.
en: who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.

ngiemboon: Andùŋ mvfò mmó gie pi ge gÿo, aa gẅi légẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, mélà’mie nkwòŋe pyaga lelÿò menò tepòŋ.
en: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

ngiemboon: Pi kúe mefɛ́ pi tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi á tsɛ̀ɛ mendá mí té ne ńzẅɛ́te.
en: Use hospitality one to another without grudging.

ngiemboon: mbà á ge tó gwɔ́ nà pʉ̀a pie é té gÿo mmó gie e Ssé ne ńkwoŋo wɔ́, é pʉ̀a tepòŋ, é gwɔ́ lêkɔ́?
en: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?

ngiemboon: Tà pi lɔg metʉ̀ sá’ pʉ̀a pie Ssé la cʉ́me mbwo pi, pi giŋ pɔ́ nà mbú gie pɔ́ ge pí fʉ̀’ ná pi.
en: neither as being lords overGod'sheritage, but being ensamples to the flock.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la pi ná nnɛ́ gi ssé á mvfò Ssé gẅie à gẅiin metʉ̀, à cʉa pú’u, à gÿo ḿbʉ’ʉ gẅi nà fʉ̀’ gie à la záb.
en: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

ngiemboon: Pi pú ńnéŋe kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie á ne ńcʉa gẅí, á nà mbwo Ssé, ńtí nue à ne ńdíe gẅí.
en: casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

ngiemboon: Yé zɔ gẅiin lésá’ njÿó á nà mengù’u mengù’.*Amen
en: To himbeglory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

ngiemboon: Acú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa Mbabilonia tsyɛ’té gẅí. E Ssé la tsɔ́’ɔ wɔ́b yɔ́b pá’ pi. Míŋ wɔ̀ɔn Malékuse tsyɛ’té gẅi yé.
en: Thechurch that isat Babylon, elected together withyou, saluteth you; andso dothMarcus my son.

ngiemboon: Asẅétè ne ńgwɔ́ ntʉ́m pi pʉ̀a Kristo metsèm.
en: Peacebewith you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńgwɔ́ né pi, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pi mboŋó, éfó ná pá’ pi zsé yé Ssé, ńgíŋ ńzsé Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô.
en: grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord,

ngiemboon: Pú’u, pi kag tʉ̀, ńkẅi’i mà mbòŋo ná gẅi lézáb ntʉ́m nà Ssé, ḿbiŋ ńgʉa ná mà mbòŋo ńkẅi’i lézsé mmó gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo,
en: And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;

ngiemboon: ńgʉa ná lezsě pɔ́ ndà’ Ssé, ńkẅi’i pá’ à nò mefɛ́ pí ge poŋo gẅí, ńgʉa ná pá’ nò mefɛ́ pí ne ḿboŋo gẅí, ńkẅí’i nkwòŋe.
en: and to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.

ngiemboon: Tá’ mèŋ n kwǎŋ ngie à fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n nyé ntentʉ́ lɔɔn, mèŋ n ge ké ne kímte gẅi mɔɔn menò kimté, é lɔgɔ zyeen gẅí.
en: Yea, I think it meet, as long as I am in this tabernacle, to stir you up by puttingyouin remembrance;

ngiemboon: Á nue mèŋ n zsě ngie, à fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n gee ńkwé cʉ́’ʉ ńku’u ku’. Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo ka gÿo mèŋ n zsé.
en: knowing that shortly I must put offthismy tabernacle, even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kě ńne ńnyɛ́te ńcwoŋte nà ntí gie mèŋ n ge gwɔ́ tà kwé, pi tyé mbɔɔ ná yɛ̌ nò wɔ́, ńkímte mmó gie n da zí’i gẅí.
en: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance.

ngiemboon: Kwà’ peg nê twó yég la jú’ yɛ̌ ngyè, peg la jú’ pá’ e fóo tÿǒ lépwó á fʉ̀’ gie pega Yěsô laa ndùm lekwɛ́ Ndʉalʉ̌a.
en: And this voice which came from heaven we heard, when we were with him in the holy mount.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a tà ńgyɔɔn cʉ́me nzèm pɔ́b ńcʉ́’ʉ ńgÿo pɔ́ menò shʉ́. Mé cʉa ná pɔ́b, ńzoonte mánzsè nò gie áa nénʉ́.
en: And many shall follow their pernicious ways; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of.

ngiemboon: À la gíŋe ńdɔg pɔ́ ntse, é ntse gẅie é la pú ńjÿó tsetsá’ ńdɔg ḿbyág ngwòŋ we fʉ̀’ʉ mvfò,
en: whereby the world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished:

ngiemboon: Peg ŋwe’e yɔɔn nò ńnáa mbwo pi, légwɔ́ gie tsɔ́ mmó té ge zága nà weglekág wɔ́.
en: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgÿo mmó gie Ssé ne ńtsẅii né pege, mbà wɛ̌ légwɔ́ ge nyɛɛ wégè ngie pege zsé Ssé
en: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie: Peg Ssé léen ńtemte, á zɛ́te ngie ngÿǒ menò mé gwɔ́ pá’ me Yěsô Kristo laa pú’u.
en: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à gɔɔn ngie ngÿǒ menò mé ee me jʉ’e fɔ̌g, ḿbiŋe ne ḿbʉa fɛ́ we, ngàŋ lɔgɔ ńnyé ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm.
en: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.

ngiemboon: ńgʉa ná pi, mbà Kristo ka náa Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a né pi. Áa mmó gie á gÿo pi métsèm zsé nò nénʉ́.
en: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńdʉ’ʉ lézẅíŋe nò Múɔ, mbà à lʉ’ʉ lézẅíŋe nò Tá wege, nyìŋ gẅie à zẅiŋé nò Mùɔ, à giŋé ńzẅíŋe ye Tá wege.
en: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father:(but) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.

ngiemboon: Kristo la ka’a mbwo pege ngie, pega Ssé ge lá’a gwɔ́ pɔ́ fʉ̀’ ntsèm.
en: And this is the promise that he hath promised us,eveneternal life.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn áa mmó gie n kě ne fa’a léshwóŋó gẅí, ńtí pʉ̀a pie é fa’a léfʉte gẅi pi fʉa mánzsè,
en: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńnéŋe ńgÿo nò tepòŋ, mbà ngàŋ lʉ’ʉ légiŋe ná*lepʉ̌ Ssé, à nue legÿo nò tepòŋ aa lelʉ’ʉ légiŋe ná*lepʉ̌ Ssé.
en: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńzsé ngie Yěsô Kristo la tó lézyɛ́b menò tepòŋ, atsɔ́ nò tepòŋ piŋ ńké tè ná yé wɔ́.
en: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.

ngiemboon: Anò gie pi la jú’ tà fó nzyeté á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie: Pege gẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege.
en: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, epʉ̀a njÿó lɔɔn ḿbʉa gẅí, tà pi mmɔɔn mmɔɔn.
en: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.

ngiemboon: Pege ge gÿo pú’u, tá zsé ngie pege ee nà gwǒŋo nò nénʉ́, é tyé mvfò Ssé ntʉ́m wégè le vɛ.
en: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.

ngiemboon: Ntʉ́m wégè lɔɔn ńzɔɔn sá’a wégè, mbà pege ne ńzsé ngie e Ssé fǎŋ ńcʉa ntʉ́m wégè ḿbiŋ ne ńzsé nò ntsèm.
en: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, ntʉ́m wégè lɔɔn tè ne sá’a wégè wɔ́, mbà pege ge tyé mvfò Ssé té ne ḿvɛɛ,
en: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not,thenhave we confidence toward God.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn tè nyìŋ mesoŋ kwoŋ, mbà à nyě tè zsě Ssé, á nue e Ssé gẅiin pɔ́ nkwòŋe.
en: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie á gÿo pege zsé ngie pege la nnɛ́ nà Ssé, e Ssé la nnɛ́ ná pege áa pá’ à la náa Zẅìge yé né pege.
en: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ ngie Yěsô aa Míŋ Ssé, mbà Ssé lǎ nnɛ́ nà ngàŋ, angàŋ gíŋe ńda yé nnɛ́ nà Ssé.
en: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná peg, peg kwoŋo nyìŋ mesoŋ, á gwɔ́, mélà’mie e Ssé la vɔg ńkwoŋo wég.
en: We love him, because he first loved us.

ngiemboon: *Lepʉ̌ sie Kristo la ná né pege, e sɔɔn. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkwoŋ Ssé, á gíŋe ńkwoŋo fɛ́ we nyìŋ mesoŋ.
en: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie pege ge fó mǒ ńzsé ngie pege ne ńkwoŋo púɔ Ssé, áa pá’ pege kwoŋ Ssé, ńgíŋe ńtÿɔ́gɔ kwò ná mbʉ̌ mé.
en: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.

ngiemboon: Á nue lekwoŋ Ssé aa pege létÿɔ́gɔ kwò ná mbʉ̌ mé, mbʉ̌ mé piŋ ńké tè tʉ ńcʉa wégè wɔ́.
en: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.

ngiemboon: Ńgwɔ́ wɔ̌ zɔɔn ńtʉ ńcʉa njÿó? À gwɔ̌ pɔ́ ndà’ nyìŋ gẅie à zẅǐŋ ngie Yěsô aa Míŋ Ssé?
en: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?

ngiemboon: é lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ menò méntá mie é la’te wégè nò ná Yěsô.
en: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn áa Zẅìge Ssé, wɔɔn gwɔ́ ntse, ńgÿo metse, pɔ́b métá ne ńda’te tà’a nò wémɔ’ɔ́.
en: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzáb ntʉ́m wé ná Míŋ Ssé, mbà ngàŋ àa gẅiin wɛ̌ le gwɔ́ ŋwɛ́, tá nyìŋ gẅie à ké tè záb à tè gẅiin.
en: He that hath the Son hath life;andhe that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

ngiemboon: Pege ne ńzsé ngie pege ee púɔ Ssé, tá’ ngwòŋ njÿó ntsèm pǔ ńjú’u pɔ́ mbwo nyìŋ tepòŋ.
en: Andwe know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, pi laga twó gí nà shúm sie pʉ̀a gu’te ngie ee Ssé.
en: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.

ngiemboon: Peg kwoŋo gẅí, á fóo ná pá’ nò nénʉ́ áa tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m wégè, é ké lá’a tsẅé gwɔ́ pɔ́ tsoló.
en: for the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.

ngiemboon: Anò ka pǔ ḿboŋo wɔ̀ɔn tɛ’ pá’ n ka jǔ’ ngie tsɔ́ penkʉ́ pú ne ńgiŋe ná mánzsè nò nénʉ́ pá’ Tá wege la tsẅi né pege la.
en: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńtsyɛ’te yé, mbà pɔ́ ngàŋ lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ tà’ ncwò ná mefà’ tepòŋ mie à ne fa’a.
en: for he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.

ngiemboon: Egubé fɛ́ gù we manzwě gẅie Ssé la tsɔ́’ɔ yé, gɔ̌ɔn ngie mèŋ n tsyɛ’te gú ńná né pɔ́b.
en: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.

ngiemboon: Awɔ̀ɔn máamáa lekág à gwɔ̌ pɔ́ lé jú’ ngie penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn ne ńgiŋe pɔ́ pá’ nò nénʉ́ ne ńzɛ́te.
en: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.

ngiemboon: Ashǔ wɔ̀ɔn we tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, ɔ̀ zsé jú pɔ́ ndà’ Kristo, ɔ̀ kẅéte mefɛ́ mefɛ́ tà mbɔɔ pie é gwɔ́ pɔ́ megʉ̀.
en: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;

ngiemboon: Á nue pɔ́ kéen ńcʉ́me mánzsè pɔ́ léfa’a fà’ Kristo, ḿbiŋ ńké tè ne ńzẅíŋe lékẅé mmó gie á fóo mbwo pà tè zsé Ssé wɔ́.
en: because that for his name's sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pege pʉ̀a Kristo gẅiin lékẅéte mefɛ́ mefɛ́ pá’ pɛ̌, légwɔ́ gie pega pɔ̌ ge lɔg púte gÿo nò nénʉ́ sa jʉ’.
en: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kě ńgẅiin menò tà é gyɔ́ɔn gyɔ̌ɔn mie ńgwɔ́ mèŋ shwóŋó gú, tá mèŋ n gyǎ ngie n te ŋwe’e ŋwe’e wɔ́.
en: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńtsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mí, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pi, ńne ńgÿo pi ne ńkẅi’i ńjú’u ngie à kwoŋo gẅi kwà’ mboŋó.
en: mercy unto you, and peace, and love, be multiplied.

ngiemboon: Tá á gʉa ná pi, mbà meshǔ pɔ́ɔn, pi kímte menò mie megàŋ ntúm Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo la tʉ́ʉ njÿó ńtsẅii mbwo pi.
en: But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;

ngiemboon: Pi tsɔ́ɔɔn mezìŋe pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ ne ḿmʉ́’te mʉ’té
en: And of some have compassion, making a difference:

ngiemboon: Menòŋo twó mé fɔ́gɔ lê tɔ́d, pɔ́ pá’ megẅì la. Nÿɔ́g mé kyɛ’ jʉ’ pá’ lʉ́me mmɔ̌g la.
en: His head andhishairswerewhite like wool, as white as snow; and his eyeswereas a flame of fire;

ngiemboon: Mekwò mé la ne ńŋwʉŋe pá’ tʉ̌ nʉ̀ gie mé nyé ńtsíbe mmɔ̌g la. Ngyè ye ne ńzẅɛɛ pá’ lepí sie é zyɛ́’ɛ la.
en: and his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pú ŋwe’e kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie ɔ̀ gyǎ, á gie ɔ̀ ne ńgyá fʉ̀’ɔɔn mbɔɔ gie ɔ̀ ge piŋ tá gyá.
en: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńkaga tʉ̀. Pi ka gyá ngɔ́’ ńtí wɔ̀ɔn, ńké tè kʉ́a.
en: and hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name's sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.

ngiemboon: Tá’, mèŋ n ké ńne ńda’a gẅi ńtí nò gie pi cʉ’ʉ́ ńkwoŋo wɔ̀ɔn pá’ pi laa nzyeté ńkwoŋo wɔ̀ɔn pú’u wɔ́.
en: Nevertheless I havesomewhatagainst thee, because thou hast left thy first love.

ngiemboon: Etsɔ́ pʉ̀a gíŋe ńgwɔ́ mbʉ̀a pi gí pie pɔ́ ne ńjú’u ndɔgtelé pʉ̀a pie ée nà nùɔ gie mé tóŋo lê Nikolayide.
en: So hast thou also them that hold the doctrine of the Nicolaitanes, which thing I hate.

ngiemboon: N ka na’á ńne ńzẅí’te zẅi’té ngie à kúbe mà we. Tá’, à tè ne ńkwoŋo lékúbe mà mpfwɔ́’ ŋwɛ́ wɔ́.
en: And I gave her space to repent of her fornication; and she repented not.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzɛ́te pɔ́ ndà’ ngie, ammó gie pi gẅiin, pi nyɛte ńkú’te mboŋó tà ńkú fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n ge gÿo tó.
en: But that which ye havealreadyhold fast till I come.

ngiemboon: é gíŋe náa cÿɔ́’ saŋ gẅie à kwɔ̌’, njÿó gwóon ńdʉ́a nê ngàŋ.
en: And I will give him the morning star.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie a Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge tɔ́g tó. Pi kú’te mmó gie áa mbwo pi tà à tʉ ńzsé ngie tsɔ̌ nyìŋ tè kẅé gi ngú’ wɔ́.
en: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn!
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé mefà’ mí. Pi tè sẅé, ńké tè tween. Pi gɔ̌ɔn ngie pi ge fó sẅé sẅé à gaa, éfó tween tween à gaa.
en: I know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot: I would thou wert cold or hot.

ngiemboon: Nyiŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: A Zẅìge Ssé lêen ńgwoon wɔ̀ɔn, n gwóon ńgyá tsɔ́ lʉŋe lefùɔ tyé tÿǒ lepwó, atsɔ̌ nyìŋ ńnéŋe mǒ.
en: And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, andonesat on the throne.

ngiemboon: Mûɔ*Njʉ̀njÿò tóo lejʉ́ŋ nyìŋ gẅie à la ńnéŋe nà lʉŋe lefùɔ la, ńkẅé ŋwà’ne ŋwɛ́ gie à la gẅiin nà pwó yé ye tʉ̀.
en: And he came and took the book out of the right hand of him that sat upon the throne.

ngiemboon: Mbɔɔ pá’ pɔ́ ge gÿo sá’ pʉ̀a ndùmo ssé tsetsá’.
en: and hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.

ngiemboon: Mûɔ*Njʉ̀njÿò nyɛ́’ɛ lìi nŋwá’ nà jʉ’ mbɔ́ɔntè yépʉ́a, n jú’ nɔ̀ɔn mbɔ́ɔntè yépʉ́a kwé’e ngyè ye tÿǒ ngie: Tóo.
en: And when he had opened the second seal, I heard the second beast say, Come and see.

ngiemboon: Mûɔ*Njʉ̀njÿò nyɛ́’ɛ lìi nŋwá’ nà jʉ’ mbɔ́ɔntè lekùa, n jú’ nɔ̀ɔn mbɔ́ɔntè lekùa kwé’e ngyè ye tÿǒ ngie: Tóo.
en: And when he had opened the fourth seal, I heard the voice of the fourth beast say, Come and see.

ngiemboon: Á nue máamáa lyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ gie pɔ́ ge gyáŋa lóŋ aa pá’ɔɔn, mbà a tǒ, ńgwɔ́ wɔ̌ vwɔ’ɔ?
en: For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?

ngiemboon: ńne ńdɔgɔ ngyè tetʉ́ʉ ńgɔɔn ngie: Nyìŋ létsẅɛ́ à fóo mbwo Ssé yege gẅie à ńnéŋe nà lʉŋe lefùɔ mbɔɔ mbwo Mûɔ*Njʉ̀njÿò.
en: and cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb.

ngiemboon: Atsɔ̌ tà’ ná melÿò lêen ńké ńzɛ́te wɔ̀ɔn ngie: Epʉ̀a pɔɔn pie pɔ́ ma’ mefɔ́gɔ nzsǒ lɔɔn ée pà wɔ̌, ḿbiŋe fóo nzɔ̌?
en: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gyá mé ná mentàŋ Sɔɔn mbʉ́a á mbwo*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé sɔɔn mbʉ́a pie pɔ́ ée ntyé mvfò Ssé.
en: And I saw the seven angels which stood before God; and to them were given seven trumpets.

ngiemboon: Ndyé melaméndɔ́ɔn lâ mesẅíŋtè pʉ̀a Ssé fó mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé ńkwɔ́’ ńgʉa ne mvfò Ssé.
en: And the smoke of the incense,which camewith the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel's hand.

ngiemboon: *Mecÿɔ́’ Ssé pie pɔ́ la gẅiin mentàŋ sɔɔn mbʉ́a la, pɔ́ nyɛte mbùm yɔb pá’ pɔ́ gee ńtóŋ mentàŋ ŋwɛ́.
en: And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.

ngiemboon: Á ge gwɔ́ nà mesaŋ ŋwɛ́, epʉ̀a mesoŋ fa’a legwé pɔ́ légyá, é tsɔ́ɔn lékwé, tá legwé kÿo wɔ́b kÿo.
en: And in those days shall men seek death, and shall not find it; and shall desire to die, and death shall flee from them.

ngiemboon: Menòŋo twó mɔ́b la gwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ menòŋo twó pànzwě la. Mesoŋ mɔ́b gwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ mesoŋ pú’ ntʉ̀ la.
en: And they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were asthe teethof lions.

ngiemboon: Ndùŋ mvfò ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ cʉ̌a. Á yɔɔn metsɔ́ mengʉ̀ngʉ̀ mémbʉ́a gwɔ́ nzèm ńne ńtóo.
en: One woe is past;and, behold, there come two woes more hereafter.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n jú’ mé gɔɔn nzẅìŋ pàlÿɔ́’ ncù pie é lɔgɔ melÿóon ńgiŋe ngie pɔ́ ée memillion nkÿo pʉ́a.
en: And the number of the army of the horsemenweretwo hundred thousand thousand: and I heard the number of them.

ngiemboon: ńdeen ńké ńga’te lê ngyè tetʉ́ʉ pá’ pú’ ntʉ̀ gẅie à ne ńcu’u la, ńga’te pú’u, mé jú’ lefaŋ vɛ́te vɛtě ngʉ̀a sɔɔn mbʉ́a.
en: and cried with a loud voice, aswhena lion roareth: and when he had cried, seven thunders uttered their voices.

ngiemboon: Ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ mbɔ́ɔntè yépʉ́a lɔgɔ pú’u, ńcʉa. Á ké yɔɔn mbɔ́ɔntè yétá gwɔ́ mánzsè ńne ńtóo.
en: The second woe is past;and, behold, the third woe cometh quickly.

ngiemboon: À laa mánzwě shwoŋ, ńne ńga’te nue múɔ la ne ńdúmo yé, á ne ńgee ńzyé.
en: and she being with child cried, travailing in birth, and pained to be delivered.

ngiemboon: Tá máamáa nnù ngém wa ké tè ncù jÿó. Ayɔ́b jʉ’ té gíŋe ńgwɔ́ tÿǒ lepwó wɔ́
en: and prevailed not; neither was their place found any more in heaven.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’.
en: If any man have an ear, let him hear.

ngiemboon: mbà mé laa mé ńjú’ cÿɔ̌ nò kẅɛɛ ncwò pɔ́b wɔ́,*alɔ̌’ɔ yɔ́b té wó wɔ́.
en: And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn nò lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie pʉ̀a Ssé, epʉ̀a pie pɔ́ kú’te*lepʉ̌ Ssé, ńzába ntʉ́m ná Yěsô, pɔ́ shÿɔg.
en: Here is the patience of the saints: herearethey that keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.

ngiemboon: Ambɔ́ɔntè yétá pfɛte ye ntú’ á tsɛ̀ɛ memí mbɔɔ tsɛ̀ɛ mesá’a ntse, mentse ŋwɛ́ sele ńcʉ́’ metse.
en: And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters; and they became blood.

ngiemboon: Ambɔ́ɔntè lekùa pfɛte ye ntú’ ná nèm, e Ssé gÿo pá’ nèm ge lɔg mmɔ̌g tuɔ pʉ̀a mesoŋ.
en: And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.

ngiemboon: Ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ yɔb mbɔɔ mefʉ̌ŋ mɔ́b gÿo pɔ́ zoonte Ssé gẅie aa tÿǒ lepwó, tá’ ńké tè kúbe mà wɔb, ńgwá’ mefà’ tepòŋ mɔ́b wɔ́.
en: and blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores, and repented not of their deeds.

ngiemboon: *Messé tepòŋ pɛ̌ lêen ńké ńcú’te mefùɔ nà tsɔ́ jʉ’ gie mé tóŋo ná shwóŋè pà Heber ngie: Amagedoŋ.
en: And he gathered them together into a place called in the Hebrew tongue Armageddon.

ngiemboon: Melá’ mie ntse la kéle ńnéŋe soŋ épú shú ńkúu ntse. Mé té gíŋe ńgyá mekwɛ́ mie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsá’ wɔ́.
en: And every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́b legém e pú ńgẅiin tà’ nkwaŋá. À gwɔ́ lépúte mɔ́b metʉ̀, pâ sɔ́b lefùɔ, ńnáa mbwo nɔ̀ɔn.
en: These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.

ngiemboon: Manzwě gẅie ɔ̀ ně ńgyá, á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ máamáa tÿǒsoŋ gie á sá’a mefùɔ pie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsá’.
en: And the woman which thou sawest is that great city, which reigneth over the kings of the earth.

ngiemboon: Á ma’ tsɔ̌ nzsǒ fÿɔ́g, mbà mé la nu’u tsɛ̀ɛ metse. Mé tóŋo yé lê shwóŋè Ssé.
en: And hewasclothed with a vesture dipped in blood: and his name is called The Word of God.

ngiemboon: Menùɔ ncù mie ée tÿǒ lepwó gwɔ́ nzèm yé, ńnéŋte ná mefɔ́gɔ lÿóon, ḿma’ mefɔ́gɔ nzsǒ mie tsɔ́ pǎb té mǒ wɔ́.
en: And the armieswhich werein heaven followed him upon white horses, clothed in fine linen, white and clean.

ngiemboon: Mbà mé ŋwe’é tsɔ́ lezíŋ nà nzsǒ fÿɔ́g ye, mbɔɔ nà ntɔ́ɔn wé, é gwɔ́ lê: Fùɔ ncʉ̀a mefùɔ, mbɔɔ lê Cʉ̀apʉ̀a mecʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: And he hath onhisvesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, ANDLordOF LORDS.

ngiemboon: Petsɔ́ mepfó ké tè fó la’ mepfó ḿbiŋ nzèm ńgíŋ ńgwɔ́ wó té gwɔ́ gie yɛ̌ ngù’ ntsá’ e kǔ’ wɔ́.
en: But the rest of the dead lived not again until the thousand years were finished. Thisisthe first resurrection.

ngiemboon: Mengù’ ntsá’ mɛ̌ ge gÿo gwɔ́ tà ku’, mé gʉa tsɛ̀ɛ ndá tsǎŋ gie Sátà aa tsoló la, ńkyɛ́’te metsɛ̂n ná ye ńnyé yé.
en: And when the thousand years are expired, Satan shall be loosed out of his prison,

ngiemboon: Wɛ̌wɛ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ gẅie à mǎ’ ncù tà ńcʉa nò tepòŋ, mèŋ n ge gÿo náa yɛ̌ fù’ mbwo yé, é gwɔ́ Ssé ye, à gwɔ́ míŋ wɔ̀ɔn.
en: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.

ngiemboon: Méncwò nká’ ge ké nyɛ́’ɛ tyé tyé fʉ̀’ ntsèm. Mé té lá’ jÿɔ́’ wɔ́, á nue nzěm ee ntěen síŋe wó wɔ́.
en: And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there.

ngiemboon: Mé ge lá’ lɔgɔ legú’ lâ mekù’ túmo túm ntsèm, é lɔg tó nuŋe wó.
en: And they shall bring the glory and honour of the nations into it.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ge gÿo ne lɔgɔ nÿɔ́g mɔ́b é gyá shÿó Ssé. À gwaa gwɔ́, mbà mé ŋwe’é lezíŋ sé nà zǐ yɔ́b.
en: and they shall see his face; and his nameshall bein their foreheads.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gee Alfa, ńgwɔ́ Omega, ńgwɔ́ ndùŋ mvfò, ńgwɔ́ nzsònzèm, ńgwɔ́ nzyeté, ńgwɔ́ nzsoté.
en: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last.

ngiemboon: *Amen. Tóo me Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô.
en: He which testifieth these things saith,Surely I come quickly.Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô ne ńgwɔ́ né pi metsèm!
en: THE END
